alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 9:36PM EST until February 26 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at La Salle affecting La Salle, Bureau and Putnam Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Lake IN and Newton Counties. Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge affecting Jasper and Porter Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural areas near the river begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: These forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well as forecast precipitation over the next 24 hours. Changes to the precipitation forecast, or any additional precipitation after 24 hours, may cause changes to these river forecasts. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/Chicago and water.weather.gov The next statement is expected by Friday afternoon.
